dmca.title: PaloAlto claims copyrighted text
dmca.body:
Sent via: Fax

Re: Copyright Infringement Notice for Google Blogger

The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on
http://www.hurdlebook.com/indez.cfm?p=5
http://www.bplans.com/dp/article.cfm/193

The blog where my copyrighted work was published on is
http://lee-hottip.blogspot.com/2007/04/planning-is-process-not-just-plan-by.html
http://lee-hottip.blogspot.com/2007/04/what-is-business-by-tim-berry.html

The articles on lee-hottip.blogspot.com come from different sections of Tim Berry's "Hurdle: The Book on Business Planning" and articles from our www.bplants.com website.

Palo Alto Software, Inc. 
[Private]
[Private]@paloalto.com 
488 E 11th Ave, Ste 22O 
Eugene, OR 97401 
P [Private] 
F [Private]

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted material described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification iS accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. 

[Private]
